trans-unit.source: Base class that represents an email attachment.
trans-unit.target: 表示電子郵件附件的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Classes <xref href="System.Net.Mail.Attachment"></xref>, <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref> derive from this class.
trans-unit.target: 類別<xref href="System.Net.Mail.Attachment"> </xref>， <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AlternateView"> </xref>，和<xref href="System.Net.Mail.LinkedResource"></xref>衍生自這個類別。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates an <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase"></xref> with the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 具現化<xref href="System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase"></xref>與指定<xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A stream containing the content for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 包含此附件的內容資料流。

trans-unit.source: contentStream is .
trans-unit.target: contentStreamis .

trans-unit.source: Instantiates an <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase"></xref> with the specified file name.
trans-unit.target: 具現化<xref href="System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase"></xref>與指定的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The file name holding the content for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 保存這個附件的內容檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: fileName is .
trans-unit.target: fileNameis .

trans-unit.target: 具現化<xref href="System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase"></xref>具有指定<xref:System.IO.Stream>和<xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"> </xref>。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.target: 內容型別。

trans-unit.target: contentType不是有效的值。

trans-unit.source: A stream containing the content for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 包含此附件的內容資料流。

trans-unit.target: mediaType不是有效的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the MIME content ID for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個附件的 MIME 內容識別碼。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> holding the content ID.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>保存內容識別碼。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Attempted to set ContentId to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定為 ContentId <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the content stream of this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個附件的內容資料流。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The content stream of this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 這個附件的內容資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets the content type of this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個附件的內容類型。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.Mime.ContentType"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The content type for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 這個附件的內容類型。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源釋出<xref href="System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用<xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>呼叫 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法會使<xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>中無法使用的狀態。</xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫 Dispose 之後，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>所佔用。</xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase> </xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: **Note** Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**永遠呼叫 Dispose 之後，再放開您的最後一個參考至<xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>。</xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它所使用的資源將不會釋放直到記憶體回收行程呼叫<xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>物件的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>參考。</xref:System.Net.Mail.AttachmentBase>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encoding of this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個附件的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.Mime.TransferEncoding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.Mime.TransferEncoding"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The encoding for this attachment.
trans-unit.target: 這個附件的編碼方式。
